verses.text: \w Then|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ziphites|strong="H2130"\w* \w came|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w Is|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w hiding|strong="H5641"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hachilah|strong="H2444"\w*, \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, accompanied \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* thousand chosen \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w there|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hachilah|strong="H2444"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* followed \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w*,

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* verify \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* arrived.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w*. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abner \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w general|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w lain|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*. \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* inside \w the|strong="H7200"\w* inner \w circle|strong="H4570"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w*, \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w troops|strong="H6635"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* asked Ahimelech \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abishai \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*’s brother, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*,” \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Abishai.

\w That|strong="H5971"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* Abishai \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w asleep|strong="H3463"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* inner \w circle|strong="H4570"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w camp|strong="H4570"\w*, \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w stuck|strong="H4600"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* ground \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w head|strong="H4763"\w*. \w And|strong="H5971"\w* Abner \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

Abishai said \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5462"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* enemy \w into|strong="H2595"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w thrust|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w into|strong="H2595"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* ground \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w stroke|strong="H3027"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* need \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w twice|strong="H6471"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Abishai, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w extend|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w*?”

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w added|strong="H3117"\w*, “\w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5062"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*; \w either|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H5595"\w*.

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w extend|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3947"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H4763"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w head|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*. \w No|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3045"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w wake|strong="H6974"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w remained|strong="H3462"\w* \w asleep|strong="H3462"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w atop|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w*; \w there|strong="H5975"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wide gulf \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Abner \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, “\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, Abner?” “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w calls|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?” Abner \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Abner, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, aren’t \w you|strong="H3588"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* equal? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w then|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w protect|strong="H8104"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w*?

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*. \w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* deserve \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w protect|strong="H8104"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Where|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w head|strong="H4763"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w recognized|strong="H5234"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* asked, “\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?” “\w It|strong="H5234"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* lord \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* continued, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lord \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w stirred|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5496"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w accept|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H5647"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* cursed \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w driven|strong="H1644"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* sharing \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* other gods.’

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w* \w far|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w look|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flea|strong="H6550"\w*, \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w hunts|strong="H7291"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w partridge|strong="H7124"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*. \w Come|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w harm|strong="H7489"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* considered \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w precious|strong="H3365"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w played|strong="H5528"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fool|strong="H5528"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grave \w error|strong="H7686"\w*!”

“\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*,” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*. “Let \w one|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.
